text: “Nganimbecheta kukwao ikaweje yamwanamwile yanti: ‘Mun'galagatileje Allah, M’mbuje gwangu soni M'mbuje gwenu.’ Soni naliji mboni pa wanganyao pa ndema janalonjele chilikati chao. Nambo katema kamwanjigele, Mmwejo ni wamwaliji wakwalolela wanganyao, soni Mmwe pa chindu chilichose m'bele Mboni.”
